products.name: Mountain Climber X
products.description: A sturdy bike for all-terrain adventures. Features a lightweight aluminum frame and 21-speed Shimano gears.

products.name: City Commuter Pro
products.description: The perfect bike for your daily commute. Comes with fenders, a rack, and a comfortable saddle.

products.name: Road Racer One
products.description: Feel the speed with this aerodynamic road bike. Carbon fiber frame and top-tier components.

products.name: Kid's First Bike
products.description: A safe and fun bike for children aged 4-6. Includes training wheels and a bell.
